title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise, oil prices soar as investors eye Russia's war, Powell's testimony - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rise, oil prices soar as investors eye Russia's war, Powell's testimony  Yahoo Finance
description: Stocks rose on Wednesday to recover some steep losses from earlier this week, with jitters over Russia's war in Ukraine and its implications for the global economy weighing on risk assets.
